tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE regulatory_changes (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  change_description TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_relations (
    relation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    entity_id INT,
    company_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (entity_id) REFERENCES regulatory_entities(entity_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES fintech_companies(company_id)
);
